scripts.precreate-uptime-monitoring: npm ci && gcloud auth application-default login
scripts.create-uptime-monitoring: cd ./uptime_monitoring && (pulumi stack init uptime-monitoring || :) && (source ../../gcloud_env_vars.sh && pulumi up --stack uptime-monitoring)
scripts.predestroy-uptime-monitoring: npm ci && gcloud auth application-default login
scripts.destroy-uptime-monitoring: cd ./uptime_monitoring && pulumi destroy --stack uptime-monitoring && pulumi stack rm uptime-monitoring
